---
title: "Ctenotus regius"
output: html_document
---


*Ctenotus regius* is a species of skinks exclusively found in Australia, mostly in arid sandy areas with sparse ground cover.  
They are medium-sized and fast-moving. Their back has white-edged dark longitudinal stripes and the sides have small white spots.
